name: The Paw Bandit
description:
The Paw Bandit is a game about thievery made in couple days on ScoreSpace Game Jam! You take a role of a thief in the museum, you have limited time to escape with the item you need to steal, there are security cameras and guards, who are trying to stop you, there are a lot of fun mechanics to use and beat them! Try your best to be in time or maybe even faster, share your results and maybe so features you found in the game for scoring best!

This game was created by 4 people:

Alice(luten)- Artist.  https://luten5.itch.io/

Juno - Coder, Project Manager, Team Leader.  https://den-den-dor.itch.io/

Vasily(cxwig)- Coder, Game Designer. https://cxwig.itch.io/

Kyo sama - artist(in spirit).

Thank you All for reading this! Have fun playing!

:)
